name: Music Saber: Video Game Song
description:
Music saber game for under, tale, fnaf, miner craft, bendy fan.

Features:
1. Video game songs in a music saber game
2. Unlimited Speed Run game.
3. Update video game songs weekly
4. Amazing sound quality - music smooth with your finger

Game rules:
Swipe your finger to move character left and right, cut the music beat while listening to music. Enjoy video game music, improve your speed! Speed increase in next round and never stop.

DISCLAIMER:
Music Saber is an unofficial fan application. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by games or films management, or record label.
This app does not include any copyrighted material.
This app is for entertainment purposes only.

FEEDBACK:
Feel free to email us song requests, issues, comments, and suggestions, with your comments, we can add more songs and make better games ever! Thank you for download game!
